channel.title: Need ip help server sided rsdw
channel.description:
hey im demonwars
me and a friend of mine are planning on putting rsdw online but we need help
how do u change the ip that the server runs on? (i mean let it run on a ip.org ip instead of 127.0.0.1)
if someone will be able to help u may be a mod when its online
Greetzz DemonWars

item.title: Need ip help server sided rsdw
item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.source: Need ip help server sided rsdw

item.title: Need ip help server sided rsdw
item.dc:creator: @jeffrey10027 jeffrey10027
item.description:
@jeffrey10027 wrote:

all u really have to do is go into ur client folder and do ctrl+f and find server or type 127.0 it will come up with something like server = 127.0.0.1 change it so say server = (type ur no-ip.org name here) then save it then build it then just open up ur no-ip duc and it should work =]

Read full topic
item.source: Need ip help server sided rsdw
